name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure
description:
A free-to-play turn based RPG.
The main story is a short series of quests to help Anri recover an artifact.
Meet interesting people.
Recruit new party members.
Learn about your party members and the region you are exploring.
Explore the world and fight challenging turn-based battles.
Repeatable dungeons with harvesting and chest nodes that reset.
Play fun mini games.
Gather food and cook it.

Designed with widescreen monitors and laptops in mind

In addition to the base game, we have the following DLCs available:

Optimization DLC: a free download for Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure and it is intended to be used on lower end operating systems.

Luminous Skies: The Pilgrimage: A standalone campaign set prior to the events in A Short Adventure.

Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure DLC: an add-on for A Short Adventure. It adds a few new quests, encounters, secrets, and new party members. We hope to add additional content on a regular basis.
